text:
Hi folks. Running into an error when trying to follow along with creating a theme in the HubSpot CMS for Developers course.
When I try to run the command, "hs create template templates/basic-page" I am getting the following error.
“File ... /npm/hs.ps1 cannot be loaded. The file is not digitally signed. You cannot run this script on the current system…”

Does anyone know how to fix/get past this?
